Uses of Interface
pathfinder.heuristics.IHeuristic

Packages that use IHeuristic
pathfinder   
pathfinder.heuristics   
 

Uses of IHeuristic in pathfinder
 

Methods in pathfinder with parameters of type IHeuristic
 void Pathfinder.setHeuristic(IHeuristic heuristic)
          Sets the heuristic function.
 

Uses of IHeuristic in pathfinder.heuristics
 

Classes in pathfinder.heuristics that implement IHeuristic
 class DiagonalEqual
          This heuristic function calculates minimal cost for regular maps with square tiles which allow diagonal movements.
 class DiagonalNotEqual
          This heuristic function calculates minimal cost for regular maps with square tiles which allow diagonal movements.
 class EuclidianHeuristic
          This heuristic function calculates minimal cost for maps that don't contain square tiles, but instead support movement in any direction.
 class ManhattanHeuristic
          This heuristic function calculates minimal cost for maps that only support horizontal and vertical movements (no diagonal movements).
